meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unwilling to work or use energy.
meanings.sent1: Her laziness prevented her from completing her chores.
meanings.sent2: His laziness at work was starting to affect his performance.
meanings.sent3: Despite her laziness, she managed to finish her project on time.
meanings.sent4: The laziness of the old car made it difficult to start in the cold weather.
meanings.sent5: The laziness of the cat lying in the sun was a picture of relaxation.

meanings.definition: A feeling of disinclination to work or exert oneself.
meanings.sent1: The student's laziness was evident in his lack of effort on the assignment.
meanings.sent2: She overcame her laziness and went for a run in the park.
meanings.sent3: The laziness of the clouds to move allowed the sun to shine brightly all day.
meanings.sent4: His laziness was like a heavy weight dragging him down.
meanings.sent5: The laziness of the sloth hanging from the tree was a sight to behold.
